about-me.title: Web Development
about-me.name: Evgeny Dibrovsky
about-me.description-2: I'm a web developer, and my hobby has smoothly turned into my main job. I have been professionally engaged in web development for several years. My experience grows with each new project, and I am grateful to my clients for their not always standard ideas and requirements for project implementation üòâ.
about-me.description-3: Today, my skills and technology stack allow me to carry out the full development cycle of the most in-demand web resources. And if I'm offered a mega-challenging project, I'll still happily take it on! After all, I'm not afraid of difficulties, and I have experienced colleagues who are always ready to help.
about-me.description-4: Let's collaborate and create something new together!

home-page.title: Home page
home-page.meta-description: Professional turnkey website creation. Only up-to-date and verified technologies.

cooperation-page.title: Cooperation
cooperation-page.sub-title: Your project is our joint mission
cooperation-page.text-1: Are you looking for a web development specialist? Consider cooperating with me. Here I offer various forms of interaction to best meet your needs.
cooperation-page.text-3: If you have a one-off project or need a long-term partner without the need for daily office presence, I will consider your freelance proposals. I approach each project responsibly, taking into account your requirements.
cooperation-page.text-5: Open to full-time job offers. I value stability and the opportunity to deeply immerse in long-term projects.
cooperation-page.text-7: Looking for a web development partner? Ready to discuss collaboration terms, become part of your team and work purposefully towards results.
cooperation-page.text-8: What you get by cooperating with me:
cooperation-page.text-9: Responsibility and reliability: I strive for accuracy and deadline adherence, ensuring high quality of work. You can count on my full commitment to your project.
cooperation-page.text-10: Experience: Despite my relatively short experience, I possess a vast array of knowledge and skills, treating each project with utmost seriousness.
cooperation-page.text-11: Flexibility: Ready to accommodate your wishes and adapt to project requirements.
cooperation-page.text-12: Awaiting your proposals and open for discussion. Together we'll find the best solution for your project!

resume-page.title: Resume
resume-page.sub-title: A bit about me and my experience
resume-page.meta-description: Take a look at my resume to see how much I love Web –íevelopment

portfolio-page.title: Portfolio
portfolio-page.sub-title: Overview of some of my works
portfolio-page.meta-description: Portfolio of projects that are created as I develop and work

brief-page.title: Brief
brief-page.text-information-1: A brief is a short description of your ideas, goals, preferences, and expectations for the project. The brief will help me better understand your vision and develop the most suitable and personalized plan for your project, ensuring that we achieve the desired outcome.
brief-page.text-information-2: When filling out the brief, focus on the project and the desired outcome, and describe it in your own words - I will understand you!
brief-page.text-information-3: Once you complete this brief, I will be able to assess the scope and complexity of the work, suggest a suitable development plan, and prepare a commercial proposal with indicative timelines and costs for the project.
brief-page.meta-title: Brief - Web development service order form
brief-page.meta-description: Fill out the Brief to create an effective solution

contacts-page.title: Contacts
contacts-page.sub-title: Contact me if you have any questions
contacts-page.meta-description: Contact me if you have questions about the development of an internet project

terms-of-use.descriptionHtml:
Terms of Use

Dear Visitor!

All materials presented on this site, including projects, images, and texts, are intended solely for acquaintance in the context of possible collaboration with me or the process necessary for recruitment.

  • Information and materials from this site are prohibited from being used for commercial, advertising, or other purposes without my written consent.

  • Please respect my copyrights and confidentiality.

If you have any questions or suggestions for cooperation, feel free to contact me directly through the provided contact details.

Consent to Data Processing

By providing my contact details or other personal information on this site, I express my consent to their processing solely for the purpose of cooperation on the services listed on the site, or recruitment.

Use of Cookies and Local Storage

The site uses cookies and Local Storage to improve your user experience, as well as for the operation of services such as language selection and color theme switching. Google Analytics is also used on the site to collect visit statistics. The site serves as a portfolio and does not provide for registration. You have access to a contact form to communicate with me, where you can leave your name, email, and message text. By continuing to use the site, you agree to our use of cookies and Local Storage. If you disagree, please leave the site.

Confidentiality

We respect your confidentiality and take all necessary measures to protect your personal information. All personal information provided on the site through the contact form or in any other way will be used exclusively to communicate with you on issues of cooperation or recruitment and will not be passed on to third parties without your clear consent.

Content Rights

All content presented on the site is my property and is protected by copyright laws. No part of the site and its content may be reproduced, transmitted, copied, modified, or used in any way without prior written permission.

Changes to the Regulation

I reserve the right to make changes to this regulation at any time without prior notice. Site visitors are obliged to regularly check the regulation for changes. Continuing to use the site after making changes will be considered your consent to such changes.

Contacts

If you have any questions regarding this regulation, please contact me using the contact information provided on the site.

Thank you for understanding and respecting my work!

contact-form.name: Name
contact-form.accept-form: I agree with the terms set forth in the regulations.

brief-form.name: Name
brief-form.specify-domain-name: Specify the planned or registered domain name
brief-form.example-sites-prompt: Specify a couple of sites as examples that you like...
brief-form.additional-project-wishes: Write all the additional requests regarding the project...
brief-form.accept-form: I agree with the terms set forth in the regulations.

possibilities.web-development-description: Development of websites and turnkey applications. Selection of the optimal stack of web technologies for successful development and convenient support of the project. For the development of large projects, it is possible to create a development team.
possibilities.web-design-description: Designing web user interfaces for sites or web applications. Creation of logos, banners, site animation. At the design stage of the site, there is also the opportunity to use template solutions.
possibilities.e-marketing-description: A set of measures aimed at increasing profits from the sale of goods or services. Market analysis, creation of advertising campaigns on the Internet. Targeted advertising, advertising in search engines and social networks.
possibilities.seo-description: A set of measures for internal and external optimization to raise the position of the site in the results of search engines for certain user requests, in order to increase network traffic and potential customers.
possibilities.site-availability-description: Design/adapt websites accessible to people with disabilities in accordance with WCAG 2.1. I have extensive experience and certifications in this area.
possibilities.technical-support-description: Maintenance and support of websites, including projects developed not only by me, but also by other specialists. Updating, installation of SSL certificates, adjusting layout, functionality, design, and much more.

cookies.title: The site uses cookies
cookies.text: We use cookies and Local Storage to enhance your user experience, as well as for services like language selection and color theme switching. The site also uses Google Analytics for visitor statistics gathering. This site is a portfolio and does not require registration. A contact form is available for you to get in touch with me, where you can leave your name, email, and message text. By continuing to use the site, you agree to our use of cookies and Local Storage. If you disagree, please leave the site. Thank you for your understanding!
